alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 25 at 2:52PM MST until December 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 5 PM today for gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels for Fire Weather Zones 222, 226, 227, and 228, which includes El Paso, Pueblo, and Fremont Counties... ...Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 am until 5 pm MST Sunday for very strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels for Fire Weather Zones 226 through 237, which includes El Paso, Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 222... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 222. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 17 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek
